TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The XmlDataSourceDesigner class is intended for use by the XmlDataSource control, and not intended for use by developers of custom XML data source controls.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method can be called.
Docs.value: , if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method can be called; otherwise, . The default is .

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method can be called.
Docs.value: , if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method can be called, otherwise . The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Configure() cil managed

Docs.summary: Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Configure method is called by the design host, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a block of XML that the associated data source control binds to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Data property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the file name of an XML file that the associated data source control binds to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The DataFile property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView GetView(string viewPath) cil managed

Docs.param: The path to the view to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the design-time data source view object for the associated control.
Docs.returns: The design-time data source view object for the associated control.

Docs.summary: Initializes the designer and loads the specified component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed

Docs.summary: Used by a designer component to add properties to or remove properties from, the Properties grid in a design host at design time or to provide new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a block of Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data%2A> property or by the XML file that is indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile%2A> property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Transform property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the file name of an Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) file (.xsl) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data%2A> property or by the XML file that is indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile%2A> property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an XPath query to apply to the XML data that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data%2A> property or by the XML file that is indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile%2A> property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
